translation.en: [narrator] In this land,
family is everything.
[narrator] It's the bonds within the pride,
the pack,
and the herd…
…that allow each member to succeed.
translation.ko: 덕분에 한 마리, 한 마리가 살아갑니다

translation.en: [narrator] Nowhere are these bonds tested more fiercely
translation.ko: 이러한 결속력이 가장 큰 시험대에 오르는 곳은

translation.en: than in the great Kalahari Desert.
Here families are shaped
by courageous mothers…
wise elders…
…and tenacious underdogs.
[narrator] All drawn to the immense oasis that lies at the desert's very heart.
translation.ko: 모두가 사막의 한가운데 있는 거대한 오아시스로 모여듭니다

translation.en: [narrator] The Okavango Delta.
Home to more wildlife than any other wetland on Earth…
translation.ko: 지구에서 이보다 생명으로 넘치는 습지는 찾아보기 힘들 겁니다

translation.en: it is seeing some of the most extreme seasonal change on the planet.
translation.ko: 동시에 현재 지구에서 가장 극단적인 계절 변화를 겪고 있죠

translation.en: [narrator] Through the chaos and hardship of the coming year…
fates will entwine,
and incredible relationships will be forged.
Not just within families but between families.
translation.ko: 가족 구성원끼리만이 아니라 여러 가족 사이를 비롯해

translation.en: And even with the land itself.
[narrator] For a two-year-old lioness,
the strength of family comes from her pride.
translation.ko: 이 가족은 무리 그 자체가 강력한 이점이죠

translation.en: She and her sisterhood control this territory…
…and their lead male reigns as warrior king.
But in the Delta, change can come suddenly
and upend a family's peaceful existence.
translation.ko: 가족들의 평화로운 한때도 순식간에 끝나곤 하죠

translation.en: [narrator] The chink in her pride's armor is the king himself.
translation.ko: 무리의 약점은 다름 아닌 우두머리 수컷입니다

translation.en: Years of fighting to defend his family and territory
translation.ko: 가족과 영역을 지키기 위해 수년간 싸운 탓에

translation.en: have taken their toll.
His weakness puts the lioness at risk.
translation.ko: 약해진 우두머리 탓에 암사자가 위험에 빠집니다

translation.en: [narrator] And presents an opportunity
for two ambitious young males.
[narrator] The old warrior marks his territory.
translation.ko: 나이 든 전사가 영역 표시를 합니다

translation.en: [narrator] But he's frail.
And outnumbered.
Every year in the Okavango is a new and dangerous journey,
translation.ko: 오카방고에서는 해마다 다르면서도 위험한 여정이 기다립니다

translation.en: but for the lioness,
this year will be the most uncertain she's ever faced.
translation.ko: 한 치 앞도 예상하기 힘든 한 해가 될 겁니다

translation.en: [narrator] Every family confronts the challenges of the Delta in its own way.
translation.ko: 델타에 사는 가족 무리들은 각자의 생존 방법이 있습니다

translation.en: [narrator] A pack of painted wolves, 24 strong.
Their strength, a testament to their great leader,
translation.ko: 그 강인함은 무리를 이끄는 자가 훌륭하단 증거입니다

translation.en: the alpha female.
[narrator] She's trained them to think and hunt as one.
And to provide for all.
But the alpha is pregnant.
Her team will lose their leader,
just as the Delta faces its greatest upheaval.
translation.ko: 하필 델타에 대격변이 도래한 이 시점에요

translation.en: [narrator] It's May.
And the surrounding Kalahari Desert is facing the worst drought in decades.
translation.ko: 주변 칼라하리 사막은 몇십 년 만의 심각한 가뭄을 겪고 있습니다

translation.en: Thousands of animals are fleeing the parched outer regions…
translation.ko: 극심한 가뭄으로 몸살을 앓는 외곽으로부터 수천 마리 동물들이

translation.en: traveling for weeks.
All drawn here for one reason.
[narrator] Water.
Rainwater that fell four months ago
in the Angolan Highlands to the north
has finally made its way down,
across the Kalahari and into the flatlands of the Delta.
[narrator] Over nine trillion liters of fresh water
floods the vast desert…
creating
the greatest oasis on the planet.
[narrator] In the flood's wake come the great herds…
joining those who live here year-round.
Everyone has a role to play
in shaping and maintaining this land.
[narrator] Even a six-month-old elephant
on her first visit.
She's never seen so much water…
translation.ko: 이렇게 물이 가득한 곳은 처음 와봅니다

translation.en: …and food.
[narrator] With endless floodplains to munch their way through,
elephants become the natural gardeners of the Delta…
uprooting far more than they can eat.
translation.ko: 실제 먹는 양보다 훨씬 많은 풀을 뽑죠

translation.en: But over-pruning can clog the waterways,
translation.ko: 그러나 풀을 너무 많이 제거하면 물길이 막혀서

translation.en: halting the water's spread.
What the gardeners have blocked up,
families of hippos bulldoze through.
Not being swimmers, they tiptoe along the bottom.
translation.ko: 하마는 수영을 못 하기에 바닥을 발끝으로 헤치며 걷습니다

translation.en: And in their wake, leave hippo-sized highways…
that connect rivers to pools and pools to floodplains…
translation.ko: 그렇게 강과 웅덩이 그리고 범람지가 이어집니다

translation.en: allowing the water to keep flowing,
feeding the vibrant growth of the entire Delta.
translation.ko: 델타 전 지역에 생명이 활기차게 자랍니다

translation.en: [narrator] But the flood isn't good news for all.
translation.ko: 그러나 홍수가 모두에게 희소식인 건 아닙니다

translation.en: For the lioness,
it means a loss of hunting grounds.
And the old warrior king is nowhere to be seen.
translation.ko: 나이 든 전사 왕의 모습이 보이지 않습니다

translation.en: [narrator] Whether he fled or was killed,
the young invaders have usurped his throne.
[narrator] Only lionesses of breeding age are allowed to stay now.
translation.ko: 한창 번식할 나이의 암사자만이 무리에 남을 수 있습니다

translation.en: [narrator] And she's not one of them.
To these new males, she's just an extra mouth to feed,
translation.ko: 새로운 수사자들에게 이 암사자는 먹여야 할 입밖에 되지 않죠

translation.en: with little to contribute.
[narrator] Banished and alone,
she'll need all her skill just to stay alive.
[narrator] The alpha female has been housebound for weeks.
translation.ko: 이 우두머리 암컷은 몇 주째 한곳에 머무는 중입니다

translation.en: Because… Well, who would leave this scruffy bunch?
translation.ko: 이 꾀죄죄한 녀석들을 자기들끼리 둘 순 없으니까요

translation.en: [narrator] At four weeks old, her pups venture out for the first time.
translation.ko: 4주 된 우두머리의 새끼들이 처음으로 세상 구경을 나왔습니다

translation.en: [narrator] All 14 of them.
Unable to hunt for herself, she must rely on her pack
translation.ko: 스스로 사냥할 수 없기에 우두머리는 무리의 도움을 받아

translation.en: to bring the meat she needs to keep her milk flowing.
translation.ko: 가져다주는 고기를 먹고 새끼들에게 모유를 먹입니다

translation.en: [narrator] But her stay-at-home work is nonstop.
Sweeping out the den…
three weeks' worth of ticks and fleas…
translation.ko: 3주 동안 쌓인 진드기와 벼룩들이 쓸려 나갑니다

translation.en: landing right back where they started.
[narrator] Her pack is on patrol…
without their leader.
And the floodwaters are slowing them down.
[narrator] Lechwe.
Just one would feed the entire pack.
translation.ko: 한 마리만 잡아도 무리 전체가 배불리 먹죠

translation.en: [narrator] With splayed hooves and powerful legs,
translation.ko: 벌어진 발굽에 강력한 다리를 갖고 있기에

translation.en: they can drive on through the flood.
Without the guidance of the alpha,
the pack follow them into the deeper water.
translation.ko: 무리는 깊은 물 속으로 리추에를 따라갑니다

translation.en: It's futile.
[narrator] And then…
a lone impala.
He lacks the paddle-like hooves and long legs of the lechwe.
translation.ko: 리추에와 달리 발굽도 노처럼 생기지 않았고 다리도 길지 않습니다

translation.en: [narrator] They finish the job quickly to avoid a clash with competitors.
translation.ko: 경쟁자들과의 충돌을 피하기 위해 빠르게 마무리합니다

translation.en: [narrator] The pack often take out the weak or injured in a group,
translation.ko: 무리는 흔히 가장 약하거나 부상당한 녀석을 노립니다

translation.en: easier prey,
with the added benefit of reducing disease in herds.
translation.ko: 피식자 무리 내에 병이 돌 확률도 낮아지니까요

translation.en: [narrator] The hunters deliver their meals in the safest way possible.
translation.ko: 사냥꾼들은 먹이를 가장 안전한 곳에 넣어 옮깁니다

translation.en: In their stomachs.
Until the pups can hunt themselves,
translation.ko: 새끼들이 직접 사냥에 나설 수 있을 때까진

translation.en: they eat first.
Generosity is a core principle of their pack.
Though learning to share doesn't come easily.
translation.ko: 다만 먹이 나눠 먹기는 배우기가 쉽지 않습니다

translation.en: Retiring to the den with your very first piece of meat
translation.ko: 처음 먹는 고깃덩어리를 물고 굴로 돌아가서

translation.en: is about as good as it gets.
[narrator] With water levels at their highest,
the Okavango becomes a true paradise.
Aquatic life from the surrounding rivers and swamps
spreads into the grassland to spawn.
Branches and trees knocked down by elephants
create protected nurseries for young fish.
translation.ko: 어린 물고기들에게 안전한 보육원이 되어 줍니다

translation.en: [narrator] During peak flood,
the Delta swells to twice its original size,
translation.ko: 델타는 평소의 두 배 크기로 불어납니다

translation.en: and anywhere high and dry becomes prime real estate.
translation.ko: 건조한 고지는 모두가 노리는 곳이 되죠

translation.en: Water fig trees provide perfect nesting
for an astonishing variety of fish-eating birds.
[narrator] For these families, it's not so much about where you build.
translation.ko: 이 새들에게는 어디에 둥지를 트느냐가 아니라

translation.en: It's what you build.
[narrator] Only the finest construction materials will do.
[narrator] If you can't find the exact fabric you're looking for…
just steal it from your neighbor.
They can always steal it back again.
[narrator] Finally,
a nest ready to hold their most treasured possessions.
translation.ko: 가장 소중한 것을 담을 둥지가 완성됐습니다

translation.en: Gently turned…
and shaded from the scalding sun.
translation.ko: 그늘을 드리워 뜨거운 햇볕도 피하게 해줍니다

translation.en: [narrator] Eggshell? Snail shell?
He's a first-time dad.
Everyone is in a race to raise their young
before the floodwaters recede…
and the nests lose their island protection.
translation.ko: 그땐 안전히 고립된 이곳도 위험해질 테니까요

translation.en: [narrator] The lioness has been struggling to make a kill.
[narrator] In drier conditions, a reedbuck or lechwe would be a good bet.
[narrator] But not in the flood, not by herself.
translation.ko: 하지만 이 홍수 시기에 혼자서는 무리입니다

translation.en: And she's got competition.
Time to push back on her rivals.
[narrator] It's pure intimidation. She won't eat the carcass.
translation.ko: 위협만 주는 것으로 시체를 먹지는 않을 겁니다

translation.en: The pack would be wise not to test her patience again.
translation.ko: 녀석들도 이제 섣불리 암사자의 성질을 건들지 않겠죠

translation.en: [narrator] By September, the temperatures rise,
and water levels begin to drop,
leaving shrinking pools crowded with fish.
Perfect timing.
[narrator] The adults get to work…
feeding their precious little monsters.
translation.ko: 귀여운 꼬마 괴물들에게 밥을 먹여야 하니까요

translation.en: [narrator] New pools form each day as the flood recedes.
translation.ko: 물이 빠지며 매일 새로운 웅덩이가 생깁니다

translation.en: [narrator] Everyone has their own special technique
to go with their own special bill.
Pelicans favor the fishing net.
[narrator] Pied kingfishers…
use the dive-bombing system.
[narrator] Openbill storks have snail-plucking down to a science.
translation.ko: 열린부리황새가 달팽이를 뽑는 실력은 예술의 경지입니다

translation.en: And the rather theatrical black egret
uses its cape to mimic shady spots where fish like to hide.
translation.ko: 날개를 둘러 물고기들이 모이기 좋아하는 그늘을 드리웁니다

translation.en: Bravo.
Different approaches with one purpose.
translation.ko: 접근법은 다 다르지만 목적은 단 하나입니다

translation.en: [narrator] To build up their chicks' strength as quickly as possible.
translation.ko: 새끼들의 힘을 최대한 빨리 키우는 것입니다

translation.en: [narrator] Pelican chicks are the greediest.
They need up to 30 feeds a day.
The tireless adults all know
the golden rule of family life in the Delta.
translation.ko: 델타 속 가족생활 원칙을 잘 알고 있습니다

translation.en: The stronger your young, the greater their chances of survival.
translation.ko: 강한 자식일수록 살아남을 가능성도 높다는 것이죠

translation.en: [narrator] As the floodwaters recede
and the desert heat builds,
hunting grounds dry out…
…shifting the balance of power back to the predators.
But alone, the lioness' kill rate is still dangerously low.
translation.ko: 그러나 암사자 혼자서는 여전히 사냥을 성공시키기 어렵습니다

translation.en: [narrator] She's growing weaker by the day.
To complicate matters,
she's come into season.
Her scent will carry to any lions in the area.
Including those she most wants to avoid.
[narrator] The young males who destroyed her family.
[narrator] But with the hunting grounds opening up,
another even bigger male is drawn to the area.
translation.ko: 그 두 마리보다도 큰 수사자가 이 지역으로 향합니다

translation.en: [narrator] His dark mane and deep call
are signs he's in his prime.
[narrator] It's risky.
But if they join forces,
he could offer protection and hunting support.
translation.ko: 암사자는 보호를 비롯해 사냥 도움도 받을 수 있습니다

translation.en: [narrator] Her newfound alliance is short-lived.
The stranger moves on after only a few days.
translation.ko: 이방인은 며칠 지나지 않아 이곳을 떠납니다

translation.en: Alone, once more,
but this time pregnant.
She won't be hunting for just herself anymore.
translation.ko: 지금부터 하는 사냥은 스스로만을 위한 게 아닙니다

translation.en: [narrator] Every family in the Delta
is intimately connected to the rhythms of the changing seasons.
The water levels are plummeting,
turning to mud.
Fun for a calf…
…but it's a sign her herd should move on.
translation.ko: 그러나 우두머리 암컷에게는 떠나야 한다는 의미입니다

translation.en: [narrator] With the dry season taking grip,
the herds need to make the most of whatever grazing is left.
translation.ko: 무리는 남은 풀을 최대한 다 먹으려고 합니다

translation.en: She learns from watching.
But some things, she has yet to perfect.
[narrator] Such as paying attention, so as not to get left behind.
translation.ko: 예를 들면 뒤처지지 않도록 주변에 집중하는 일요

translation.en: She's being taken to a special place.
A stand of fan palms.
They thrive where salts have been left behind by the evaporating flood.
translation.ko: 홍수가 증발하며 소금을 남긴 자리에서 자라는 녀석들이죠

translation.en: And the fruits that sit at the top
are revered by elephants.
Harvesting such lofty treats
is a trick that only a four-ton bull can pull off.
translation.ko: 4톤이나 나가는 코끼리가 아니고서야 먹을 수 없죠

translation.en: Each shake releases hundreds of fruits at once.
translation.ko: 한 번 흔들 때마다 열매 수백 개가 떨어집니다

translation.en: [narrator] He knocks down enough for everyone.
[narrator] This precious meal
is not just for this family and not just for today.
translation.ko: 이 코끼리 가족뿐만 아니라 후에 다른 가족의 식사도 됩니다

translation.en: Elephants are the chief distributors
of fan palm seeds.
-The calf's ancestors left this fruit. -[whines]
translation.ko: 오늘의 열매도 이 꼬마의 조상이 남긴 겁니다

translation.en: [narrator] And now she will do the same for those to come.
translation.ko: 녀석도 후대를 위해 같은 일을 하게 되겠죠

translation.en: The herd will carry the seeds for many miles.
translation.ko: 무리는 씨를 수 킬로미터 바깥까지 나를 겁니다

translation.en: Wherever they release them in their dung, they can take root.
translation.ko: 대변을 통해 나온 씨앗은 그곳에 뿌리를 내리겠죠

translation.en: Just another of the herd's vital contributions to the Delta.
translation.ko: 코끼리 무리가 델타에 기여하는 또 하나의 모습입니다

translation.en: [narrator] It will be their last decent meal.
translation.ko: 한동안 이렇게 풍족한 식사는 힘들 겁니다

translation.en: From here on,
the increasing scarcity of food and water will drive their every move.
translation.ko: 이제부터는 음식과 물이 갈수록 부족해지며 이동의 초점도 거기 맞춰지겠죠

translation.en: [narrator] The painted wolves have made it through the flood,
but not entirely intact.
One team member already killed,
and now the best hunters have deserted the alpha and her pups.
translation.ko: 제일 뛰어난 사냥꾼들은 우두머리와 새끼를 버렸습니다

translation.en: [narrator] Too many new mouths to feed
and not enough food to go around.
It's time for the rookies to move out of the den
and begin searching for food.
[narrator] The pups' first great adventure.
Their first patrol with the grown-ups.
Though, they are more of a hindrance than a help.
translation.ko: 도움이 된다기보단 방해만 하는 것 같지만요

translation.en: Their little legs will carry them up to 15 kilometers a day.
The alpha must rebuild her team into a peak hunting machine…
translation.ko: 우두머리는 무리를 다시 노련한 사냥 기계로 훈련시켜야 합니다

translation.en: and teach her pups the ways of the pack hunter.
[narrator] The receding floodwaters
have created perfect conditions to unleash a plague.
[narrator] Locusts.
The building heat triggers a mass hatching.
translation.ko: 기온이 오르면서 알이 대량으로 부화한 겁니다

translation.en: Ten million greedy mouths devour the drying vegetation.
translation.ko: 굶주린 메뚜기 천만 마리가 말라가는 초목을 집어삼킵니다

translation.en: Ancient termite mounds seem to be the only things impervious
translation.ko: 오래된 흰개미 집만이 델타 속 거대한 소용돌이에도

translation.en: to the great forces now at play in the Delta.
translation.ko: 유일하게 변함없이 버티고 서 있는 듯합니다

translation.en: It's October.
In two short months,
the drought has transformed a verdant paradise
into a barren dust bowl.
All the herds are searching for water
wherever they can find it.
[narrator] They are easy pickings for the two young males.
Who grow bigger and stronger every day.
translation.ko: 두 사자는 매일 갈수록 크고 강해지고 있습니다

translation.en: [narrator] They follow the buffaloes' every move.
Tracking the same herds,
the lioness must stay a safe distance from the males.
translation.ko: 같은 무리를 쫓고 있는데 거리를 충분히 둬야만 합니다

translation.en: [narrator] In her delicate state, she desperately needs to eat.
[narrator] But taking on prey the size of a buffalo all by herself
translation.ko: 그러나 물소 크기의 먹잇감을 홀로 사냥하는 것은 거의 불가능합니다

translation.en: is next to impossible.
[narrator] At best, she can pick up scraps left by the males,
translation.ko: 수사자들이 남긴 찌꺼기라도 먹는 것이 최선입니다

translation.en: scavenging the bare minimum she needs to stay alive.
translation.ko: 간신히 생존할 정도의 먹이만 얻어 가는군요

translation.en: [narrator] All the herds and their predators are being drawn in by the drought,
translation.ko: 온갖 피식자와 포식자들이 가뭄에 한곳으로 몰려

translation.en: coming together in the heart of the Delta,
where the last water sources remain.
[narrator] The calf and her herd
have to travel further with each passing day.
translation.ko: 매일 갈수록 더 멀리 가야 합니다

translation.en: [narrator] Their eyesight may be poor, but with highly attuned hearing and smell,
translation.ko: 시력은 안 좋지만 뛰어난 청각과 후각으로

translation.en: elephants can sense danger from miles away.
translation.ko: 코끼리는 수 킬로미터 바깥의 위험도 감지합니다

translation.en: [narrator] Nile crocodiles.
Some up to six meters long, weighing three-quarters of a ton.
But most are pretty small, only a meter or so.
[narrator] The older elephants show the calf how to get to the water
translation.ko: 나이 든 코끼리들이 새끼에게 물가로 가기 위해

translation.en: by navigating this strange obstacle course.
translation.ko: 이 이상한 장애물 코스를 어떻게 지나는지 보여줍니다

translation.en: [narrator] At last.
And if you still haven't mastered the art of the trunk,
face drinking is always a good fallback.
translation.ko: 얼굴을 박고 마시는 것도 괜찮은 대안이겠죠

translation.en: [narrator] The calf is learning…
the hard way.
This water hole is the herd's savior.
translation.ko: 코끼리 무리가 물웅덩이 덕을 톡톡히 보는군요

translation.en: Elephants also use it to protect their skin from the sun.
translation.ko: 진흙을 덮어 따가운 태양으로부터 피부도 보호합니다

translation.en: [narrator] The mud cools their overheated bodies as it evaporates.
translation.ko: 진흙이 증발하면서 높은 체온도 식혀 줍니다

translation.en: And the dust settles in the cracks and crevices of their skin,
translation.ko: 먼지 역시 코끼리 피부의 주름과 틈 사이에 자리 잡아

translation.en: acting as sunblock.
A spot like this is highly sought-after.
[narrator] But the herd aren't ready to move on from their mud spa just yet.
translation.ko: 그러나 코끼리들이 아직 진흙 스파를 덜 즐긴 모양입니다

translation.en: [narrator] Such difficult times teach the growing pups many things.
translation.ko: 어린 새끼들에게 많은 것을 가르치기 쉽지 않은 시기입니다

translation.en: Harassing a well-fed vulture must be a good lesson in… something.
translation.ko: 배부른 독수리를 괴롭히는 일에도 교훈이 있겠죠

translation.en: [narrator] A lone hyena…
makes for a more serious education.
Testing their stress levels helps prepare them
translation.ko: 스트레스 정도를 시험하면서 미래에 경쟁자들과 마주할 때를

translation.en: for future confrontations with competitors.
translation.ko: 스트레스 정도를 시험하면서 미래에 경쟁자들과 마주할 때를 대비하는 것이죠

translation.en: [narrator] But they still need to learn the most important lesson.
translation.ko: 그러나 가장 중요한 수업이 아직 남았습니다

translation.en: [narrator] The art…
of the hunt.
[narrator] With the alpha now back in charge…
she directs the team to drive their prey into the thick mud
translation.ko: 무리를 이끌어 사냥감을 뻑뻑한 진흙탕으로 몰아

translation.en: to slow them down.
[narrator] Her coaching is paying off.
They're learning who to target…
translation.ko: 누구를 노릴지 누구는 건들면 안 되는지

translation.en: and who to leave.
[narrator] The pack is growing wiser and closer each day.
translation.ko: 갈수록 무리는 똑똑해지고 또 서로 가까워집니다

translation.en: [narrator] By late October, temperatures have soared to 45 degrees Celsius.
[narrator] Not a drop has fallen.
In recent years, the dry seasons here have been getting longer,
translation.ko: 최근 몇 년간 이곳의 가뭄은 길어지고

translation.en: the heat more severe.
[narrator] This year is fast becoming the drought of the century.
Every day becomes a gamble
to find enough water to keep the whole herd alive.
translation.ko: 과연 무리 모두를 살릴 물을 찾을 수 있을까요?

translation.en: [narrator] The calf and her mother need it the most.
translation.ko: 어린 코끼리와 그 어미에게 물이 가장 절실합니다

translation.en: She's a prisoner in these lands
that only a few months ago offered her so much.
translation.ko: 겨우 몇 개월 전에는 그토록 풍요롭던 곳인데요

translation.en: [narrator] Her survival is entirely in the hands
of the wise, old leader.
The herd's matriarch.
She's been traveling these pathways
since she, too, was a young calf.
Her brain, infused with memories,
translation.ko: 여러 기억으로 가득한 이 코끼리의 뇌에는

translation.en: holds an ancient internal map
of where the last pockets of water might be found.
translation.ko: 최후의 물웅덩이 몇 군데의 위치가 표시돼 있죠

translation.en: [narrator] Family is more than just the herd.
Family is memory…
and that's what's making the difference
between life and death.
[narrator] The old family knowledge leads them to one of the last remaining water holes
translation.ko: 옛 가족과의 기억이 델타 전역에 얼마 안 남은

translation.en: in the entire Delta.
[narrator] Every muddy drop is a lifesaver.
translation.ko: 흙탕물 한 방울, 한 방울이 생명수입니다

translation.en: But their little one can't get to the water.
translation.ko: 그런데 어린 녀석은 물가에 코가 안 닿는군요

translation.en: [narrator] So she simply gets into the water.
Getting out, not so easy.
[narrator] For a clumsy calf, a loving family is her most powerful ally.
translation.ko: 서투른 새끼에게는 사랑 가득한 가족이 최고의 힘이죠

translation.en: [narrator] There's no time to waste.
They need more water,
and they'll chase the storm front to find it.
-Finally, clouds begin to form. -[thunder rumbling]
Giant storm cells.
[narrator] Elephants are able to hear the low frequencies of distant thunder
translation.ko: 코끼리는 멀리서 울리는 천둥의 저주파를 들을 수 있습니다

translation.en: and detect storms up to 200 kilometers away.
[narrator] But in a region that's gone seven months with barely a drop of rain,
translation.ko: 그러나 7개월 동안 비 한 방울 내리지 않아 말라비틀어진 이곳의

translation.en: the tinder-dry grasses are a ticking bomb.
The adults in the herd have seen fire before.
translation.ko: 무리의 어른들은 전에도 불을 본 적 있습니다

translation.en: Each year, up to 4,000 square kilometers of the Delta burns.
They know to stick close together as they try to navigate the flames.
translation.ko: 화염을 피하려면 바짝 붙어 다녀야 하죠

translation.en: The fires are devastating…
…but don't devour everything.
[narrator] The grazers have thinned the amount of fuel available to burn.
translation.ko: 동물들이 풀을 뜯은 덕에 불탈 초목이 많지 않았습니다

translation.en: And the scorched areas will create new pathways
for next year's flood to access.
The Delta has always found a way to heal
because its residents never stop playing their part.
translation.ko: 이곳의 주민들이 꾸준히 자기 역할을 해낸 덕이죠

translation.en: [narrator] At last, the skies yield.
The greatest drought in living memory
is finally broken.
[narrator] Over the next five months,
half a meter of rain will fall here.
Any ground scorched by the fire
will be revitalized.
[narrator] The herds are released from their water holes.
-And the predators spread out. -[growls]
[narrator] Keeping the grazers on the move,
giving the new shoots a chance,
and preventing any one area from becoming depleted.
translation.ko: 덕분에 한 지역의 풀이 고갈되는 것을 막을 수 있습니다

translation.en: [narrator] Balance…
is maintained.
[narrator] And with the arrival of the rains…
come four new cubs.
[narrator] The flush of green has prompted a baby boom.
translation.ko: 만연한 초목과 더불어 여기저기서 아기들이 태어나는군요

translation.en: [narrator] She moves her cubs every few days…
translation.ko: 어미는 며칠 간격으로 새끼들을 다른 곳에 숨깁니다

translation.en: to prevent their scent from attracting enemies.
translation.ko: 천적이 새끼 냄새를 맡고 접근하지 않도록요

translation.en: [narrator] But her latest move hasn't gone unnoticed.
translation.ko: 그러나 최근 이동을 지켜보는 이가 있었습니다

translation.en: [narrator] The young males have picked up their trail.
They will not tolerate the presence of another male's cubs.
translation.ko: 다른 수컷의 새끼가 돌아다니게 두지 않을 셈입니다

translation.en: [narrator] She's half their size and outnumbered.
translation.ko: 암컷은 수컷의 절반 크기에 수적으로도 불리합니다

translation.en: [narrator] They're trapped.
[narrator] Her instinct is to lead her babies to safety.
translation.ko: 새끼를 안전한 곳으로 옮기는 것이 어미의 본능입니다

translation.en: [narrator] But the cubs have no idea who they're up against.
translation.ko: 그러나 새끼들은 지금 어떤 적수를 상대하는지조차 모릅니다

translation.en: [narrator] She's lost track of a cub.
[narrator] She'll fight to the death for her family…
translation.ko: 암사자는 가족을 위해서 죽음도 불사하고 싸울 겁니다

translation.en: …but the males won't risk further injury.
translation.ko: 다행히 수사자들은 더 이상 부상을 무릅쓸 생각이 없습니다

translation.en: [narrator] Thanks to their mother's bravery, three of her cubs have survived.
translation.ko: 용맹한 어미 덕에 새끼 세 마리가 살아남았습니다

translation.en: [narrator] She can't rest for long.
She's all they've got.
[narrator] For the painted wolves, life again is sweet.
Their mother has risen
to the greatest challenge she's ever faced.
Bringing a pack cut to half its size
through the perils of the drought
and transforming a hapless bunch of rookies
into a hardworking, successful team.
[narrator] Their comeback is complete.
[narrator] The gutsy little calf has chalked up her first year in the Delta…
translation.ko: 이 배짱 있는 새끼 코끼리는 델타에서 첫해를 무사히 났습니다

translation.en: and she herself has contributed to its upkeep…
with every reed she's trampled,
every palm seed she's left.
If she can survive another 30 or 40 more years
of increasing extremes,
fires, floods, and famines…
…she will finally become a matriarch
and pass on everything she's learned
to the next generation.
[narrator] Now, four months old,
the lioness's cubs are getting stronger
and more able every day.
Single-handedly, she's kept them all well-fed.
translation.ko: 암사자는 혼자 힘으로 새끼들을 배불리 먹입니다

translation.en: [narrator] Their games are practice for real life.
To teach them how to catch prey like their mother.
[narrator] She once lost what was most precious to her.
translation.ko: 이 암사자는 한때 가장 소중했던 것을 잃었습니다

translation.en: But now, has a little pride to call her own.
translation.ko: 하지만 이제 자기만의 작은 무리가 생겼죠

translation.en: [narrator] Her cubs will soon learn the vital importance of family.
translation.ko: 새끼들은 곧 가족이 얼마나 중요한지 배울 겁니다

translation.en: Just one of a myriad of families whose presence sustains their land.
translation.ko: 이 땅을 지탱하는 수많은 가족 중 하나일 뿐이지만요

translation.en: [narrator] These animals will continue to adapt
as best they can…
to the growing threats they face.
The world's climate changing…
becoming increasingly hostile, more extreme.
translation.ko: 갈수록 환경은 자비 없고 극단적으로 변합니다

translation.en: Their greatest weapon in their fight to survive is each other.
translation.ko: 생존 경쟁에서 가장 강력한 무기는 바로 서로입니다

translation.en: For their fates are bound together with this great wilderness.
translation.ko: 이 위대한 자연 안에서 이들의 운명은 하나니까요

translation.en: The magnificent,
ever-changing
Okavango Delta.
